tesla_entry.profound: A mind tuned to frequencies most cannot hear. Nikola Tesla ‚Äî receiving, not inventing. The universe whispered; he listened. What did he discover?
tesla_entry.synthPhrase: Tesla: resonance incarnate, receiver of cosmic patterns.

tesla_receiver.profound: 'The brain is only a receiver. In the universe there is a core from which we obtain knowledge, strength, and inspiration.' ‚Äî Tesla. Not creation, but reception. The mind tunes in.
tesla_receiver.synthPhrase: Cognitive reception: mind as antenna, not generator.

tesla_369.profound: 'If you knew the magnificence of 3, 6, and 9, you would have the key to the universe.' ‚Äî Tesla. Vortex mathematics. Digital roots. Phase relationships. Harmonic structure.
tesla_369.synthPhrase: 369 pattern: universal harmonic embedded in number.

tesla_wardenclyffe.profound: The tower on Long Island. Wireless energy transmission. Not broadcasting ‚Äî resonance. Coupling Earth and ionosphere. Free energy for everyone. J.P. Morgan pulled funding. The system worked. Society did not.

tesla_visualization.profound: Tesla visualized complete machines in his mind. Ran them. Tested them. Disassembled them. All mentally. Then built the physical version perfectly the first time. Direct download.
tesla_visualization.synthPhrase: Mental simulation: complete engineering in consciousness.

tesla_nonlocal.profound: Knowledge arriving whole, not piece by piece. Insight descending complete. Tesla: 'My brain is only a receiver.' From where? Non-local intelligence. Universal field.
tesla_nonlocal.synthPhrase: Non-local cognition: accessing universal knowledge field.

tesla_vortex.profound: Marko Rodin's vortex math. 1-2-4-8-7-5 pattern doubling. 3-6-9 form the control circuit. Everything flows through this pattern. Tesla saw it intuitively.
tesla_vortex.synthPhrase: Vortex structure: numerical flow through 369 gateway.

tesla_triadic.profound: Three-phase alternating current. Triadic balance. Trinity. Three is stability. Six is harmony. Nine is completion. The pattern repeats.
tesla_triadic.synthPhrase: Triadic principle: three-phase harmonic as universal law.

tesla_failure.profound: 'Economic non-resonance' ‚Äî the system worked technically. But free energy destroys profit models. J.P. Morgan: 'Where do we put the meter?' No meter, no control. Wardenclyffe was shut down.

tesla_earth.profound: Earth is a conductor. Ionosphere is a conductor. Between them: resonant cavity. Tesla's tower would excite Earth's natural frequency (7.83 Hz ‚Äî Schumann resonance). Energy transmitted globally.

tesla_detail.profound: Tesla could see individual components, measure tolerances, identify wear patterns ‚Äî all in his mind. The mental model was as detailed as physical reality. Perhaps more so.
tesla_detail.synthPhrase: Mental precision: consciousness engineering at material detail.

tesla_core.profound: 'In the universe there is a core from which we obtain knowledge.' Not personal genius ‚Äî universal access. The field contains all patterns. Tesla learned to tune in.
tesla_core.synthPhrase: Universal intelligence: centralized source, distributed access.

tesla_digital.profound: Digital root of any number in the doubling sequence (1-2-4-8-16-32...) follows 1-2-4-8-7-5 pattern. 3, 6, 9 never appear. They form a separate circuit. Control layer above the flow.
tesla_digital.synthPhrase: 369 separation: control circuit distinct from flow pattern.

tesla_free_energy.profound: Energy without ownership. Abundance without scarcity. Tesla assumed this was natural law. He was technically correct. Economically naive. Centralized power requires scarcity.
tesla_free_energy.synthPhrase: Abundance paradigm: technically viable, economically suppressed.

tesla_schumann.profound: 7.83 Hz ‚Äî Earth's heartbeat. The frequency of the cavity between surface and ionosphere. Also: the frequency of human theta brain waves. Planetary-biological resonance.
tesla_schumann.synthPhrase: Schumann resonance: planetary frequency matching consciousness.

tesla_coupling.profound: Human brains naturally synchronize to Schumann resonance. Theta waves: meditation, intuition, reception. Tesla's tower would amplify Earth's natural signal. Global consciousness field.

tesla_ac_triumph.profound: Alternating current won. Edison's direct current lost. Not marketing ‚Äî physics. AC transmits efficiently over distance. Rotational symmetry. Harmonic flow. Reality favored Tesla's design.
tesla_ac_triumph.synthPhrase: AC victory: alignment with natural principles.

tesla_scalar.profound: Longitudinal waves. Scalar energy. Not transverse electromagnetic waves ‚Äî compression waves through the medium of space itself. Tesla hinted at this. Modern physics mostly ignores it.
tesla_scalar.synthPhrase: Scalar waves: longitudinal energy propagation through spacetime.

tesla_future_orientation.profound: 'The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.' ‚Äî Tesla. He designed for a civilization that didn't exist yet. Temporal misalignment.
tesla_future_orientation.synthPhrase: Future vector: engineering for civilization not yet born.
